devdoc.author: blOX Consulting LLC Date: 08.09.2019 Liquidity Contract for Secretary to post stake into  Administrator remittance should always pay out secretary

params._dai: the address of the Dai ERC20 contract
params._liquidity: the minimum required liquidity to satisfy the contract
params._secretary: the beneficiary address of the timelock

liquid().return: bool true if the contract's Dai balance is greater than         liquidity requirement defined at construction, and false otherwise

transferPrimary(address).details: Transfers contract to a new primary.

liquid().notice: Determine if the liquidity contract is sufficienty liquid

withdraw().notice: Withdraw the current balance to the Secretary
